sentences: I'm looking for a new job.
What is your job?
I have a lot of work to do today.
He enjoys his work.
translations: יש לי הרבה עבודה לעשות היום.

sentences: She has a successful career in marketing.
He is building a career in technology.
Teaching is a rewarding profession.
He chose law as his profession.
She is a valued employee of the company.
The company has over 100 employees.
My employer is a large corporation.
The employer provides health insurance.
I work in a busy office.
His office is on the third floor.
She started her own business.
Business is booming this year.
We have a meeting at 10 AM.
The meeting was very productive.
He earns a good salary.
What is the starting salary for this position?
She received a promotion to senior manager.
He is hoping for a promotion soon.
I'm going on vacation next week.
We had a relaxing vacation.
New employees receive training.
The company offers ongoing training opportunities.
She did an internship at a law firm.
An internship can provide valuable experience.
translations: היא עשתה התמחות במשרד עורכי דין.
התמחות יכולה לספק ניסיון רב ערך.

sentences: I have a job interview tomorrow.
The interview process was quite thorough.
Please send me your resume.
I need to update my resume.
translations: בבקשה שלח לי את קורות החיים שלך.
אני צריך לעדכן את קורות החיים שלי.

sentences: The university has a challenging curriculum.
She reviewed the curriculum for the new course.
translations: היא סקרה את תוכנית הלימודים לקורס החדש.

sentences: He has a degree in computer science.
She is pursuing a master's degree.
She studies at the local university.
The university has a large campus.
He went to college in Boston.
The college offers various programs.
My children go to the local school.
School starts at 8 AM.
translations: הילדים שלי הולכים לבית הספר המקומי.

sentences: I have a math class this morning.
The class was very interesting.
She is a hardworking student.
The students are preparing for their exams.
Our teacher is very knowledgeable.
I asked the teacher a question.
The principal addressed the students.
She had a meeting with the school principal.
translations: הייתה לה פגישה עם מנהל בית הספר.

sentences: The professor gave an interesting lecture.
I took notes during the lecture.
I have an exam next week.
She studied hard for the final exam.
He got a good grade on the test.
What was your grade in math?
I need to study for my exam.
He enjoys studying history.
She is conducting research on climate change.
The research findings were published.
translations: היא עורכת מחקר על שינויי אקלים.

sentences: I have a lot of homework tonight.
Did you finish your homework?
translations: יש לי הרבה שיעורי בית הערב.

sentences: We have a group assignment due next week.
The assignment was quite challenging.
translations: יש לנו עבודה קבוצתית שצריך להגיש בשבוע הבא.

sentences: The project deadline is Friday.
I'm working hard to meet the deadline.
translations: המועד האחרון של הפרויקט הוא יום שישי.
אני עובד קשה כדי לעמוד בלוח הזמנים.

sentences: I'm taking a course in graphic design.
The college offers many different courses.
Math is my favorite subject.
What subjects are you studying?
I attended a seminar on marketing.
The seminar was very informative.
We formed a study group for the final exam.
The study group meets twice a week.
She received a scholarship to attend university.
There are many scholarships available for students.
translations: היא קיבלה מלגה כדי ללמוד באוניברסיטה.

sentences: He received his high school diploma.
The college offers a diploma in business administration.
translations: הוא קיבל את תעודת הבגרות שלו.

sentences: We celebrated her graduation.
Graduation day is a special occasion.
She earned a bachelor's degree.
A law degree requires many years of study.
translations: תואר במשפטים דורש שנות לימוד רבות.

sentences: He received a certificate in web development.
The training program offers a certificate upon completion.
translations: תוכנית ההכשרה מציעה תעודה עם סיום.

sentences: What is your field of study?
She chose medicine as her field of study.
translations: היא בחרה ברפואה כתחום הלימודים שלה.

sentences: Tuition fees have increased this year.
Paying for university tuition can be expensive.
translations: תשלום שכר לימוד באוניברסיטה יכול להיות יקר.

sentences: The tuition fee is due at the start of the semester.
Many students struggle to pay the high tuition fee.
translations: יש לשלם את שכר הלימוד בתחילת הסמסטר.
סטודנטים רבים מתקשים לשלם את שכר הלימוד הגבוה.

sentences: The university has a distinguished faculty.
He is a member of the science faculty.
The lecture hall was packed with students.
The professor spoke in a large lecture hall.
The university campus is very beautiful.
There are many facilities on campus.
The classroom was bright and spacious.
Students sat at desks in the classroom.
Many students rely on student loans to pay for their education.
He is still paying off his student loan.
translations: סטודנטים רבים מסתמכים על הלוואות סטודנטים כדי לשלם עבור השכלתם.
הוא עדיין משלם את הלוואת הסטודנטים שלו.

sentences: Make sure you have all the necessary study material.
The professor provided useful study material.
translations: ודא שיש לך את כל חומר הלימוד הדרוש.

sentences: I attended a writing workshop.
The company organized a team-building workshop.
She is working as an intern this summer.
The company has several interns.
My supervisor is very supportive.
He had a meeting with his supervisor.
translations: הייתה לו פגישה עם הממונה עליו.

sentences: I enjoy working with my colleagues.
She is a helpful colleague.
translations: אני נהנה לעבוד עם הקולגות שלי.

sentences: We work well as a team.
The team achieved its goals.
I'm attending a conference next month.
The conference brought together experts in the field.
He gave a clear and informative presentation.
We need to prepare a presentation for the meeting.
Teamwork is essential for this project.
They demonstrated excellent teamwork.
Graduating with honors was a great achievement.
The project was a significant achievement.
translations: סיום הלימודים בהצטיינות היה הישג גדול.

sentences: I have a job interview this afternoon.
Prepare thoroughly for your job interview.
translations: יש לי ראיון עבודה אחר הצהריים.

sentences: I have my annual performance review next week.
The performance review provided constructive feedback.
translations: יש לי הערכת ביצועים שנתית בשבוע הבא.

sentences: The workplace environment is very positive.
Safety is important in the workplace.
We are working on a new project.
The project is due next month.
The company offers excellent employee benefits.
Health insurance is a common employee benefit.
translations: ביטוח בריאות הוא הטבת עובדים נפוצה.

sentences: He signed the employment contract.
The contract outlines the terms of employment.
My work hours are 9 to 5.
What are your standard work hours?
translations: שעות העבודה שלי הן מ-9 עד 5.

sentences: I had to work overtime last week.
Overtime pay is usually higher.
translations: הייתי צריך לעבוד שעות נוספות בשבוע שעבר.
תשלום עבור שעות נוספות הוא בדרך כלל גבוה יותר.

sentences: He received a raise in his salary.
She asked for a raise during her performance review.
translations: היא ביקשה העלאה במהלך הערכת הביצועים שלה.

sentences: She is seeking full-time employment.
Employment rates have improved this year.
There is a job opening for a marketing position.
He applied for several different positions.
translations: הוא הגיש מועמדות למספר משרות שונות.
